resources.string: "There was an error while deleting this entry"
"We are sorry, but something went wrong."
"There is a new version of TrashOut app. Please update your current version."
"Your device has geo turned off - please turn it on in Settings -> Location services."
"You have disallowed TrashOut app from running geolocation services. Please turn it on in Settings -> Location services."
"Your system has disallowed TrashOut app from running geolocation services. "
"Sorry for inconvenience, you are now logged out. Please sign in again."

"Report Trash allows you report illegal dump anywhere in the world. Reporting is the first step which leads to cleaning.
GO, locate illegal dump by pressing the button “Report Trash”!"

"TrashOut is an environmental project which aims to map and monitor all illegal dumps around the world.
Our goal is to involve citizens, governments, municipalities and organizations so we can together contribute to cleaner world for everyone.
Thank You for joining TrashOut environmental community and keeping it running."
"Thanks to your donations we can run our servers, update and improve TrashOut application, add new functionalities and most importantly continue out mission to clean the world. "
"Oops, we are waiting for server to give us more information. Please give us a second."
"You have to be near the dump to update it."
"Do you really want to log out?"
"All your activity will be synced. You will get points for your activities."
"Oops, the e-mail you entered looks invalid"
"Oops, your password and e-mail don't match"
"Please enter an email address you used previously to register to TrashOut"
"Oops, it looks like somebody is already registered with this e-mail"
"Oops, please enter longer password. At least 8 characters."
"Oops, we cannot register you without internet access. Please come back when you are back online"
"Oops, we cannot sign you in without internet access. Please come back when you are back online."
"Info how to reset your password was sent to your e-mail address."
"Please fill in your e-mail address and password."
"Oops, you haven't filled in all fields."
"Oops, we cannot sign you out without internet access. Please come back when you are online"
"Please, can you provide us with more data?"
"Do you want to delete selected photo?"
Old GPS location! Turn on location sharing.

"This illegal dump will be submitted later, because your phone is offline.
When you get online please turn on TrashOut app and your report will be submitted automatically."
"Don't worry. We saved your progress and we will try to send your report right after you start TrashOut again."
"Do you really want to delete this report?"
"We are experiencing temporary issue with our server. We are doing our best to fix it soon. Please come back later."
"Do you really want to report this trash as spam?"
"Our service is temporary unavailable, please try again later"
"“Please connect to the internet in order to see this section.”"
"Oops, we could NOT save the data."
"TrashOut wants to use your location to display dumps around you. Please enable it in your phone settings."
"View worldwide statistics or statistics for countries."
"Sorry, we don't have any email address set for this area. Please insert it manually."
"Please check the date and duration of an event."
"Please check the e-mail in contact information."
"Please check the phone number in contact information."
"Please log in to join this event."
"Do you want to cancel this event?"
"Would you like to navigate to this place?"
"It is nearby... It contains products of specific brand... I found it when..."
"You must take at least one photo"
"You must take at least one photo"
"You are more than 100 m from dump or you have bad accuracy"
"Can not upload photos, please try it again later"
"What attendees need to bring (e.g.: gloves, water...)"
"Thank you, event was successfully created. You can edit your event and see attendees at www.admin.trashout.ngo."
"You must set start of a meeting first"
"Cleaning event can not be added to your calendar"
"Cleaning event was added to your calendar"
"Type of waste you can dispose here"
"You have earned %d points so far! Update more dumps to receive more. Thank you!"
"Can not upload photo, please try it again later"
"Can not update user profile, try it again later"
"It is not possible to send an e-mail."
"Illegal dump was reported! Details about illegal dump can be found on website: %s"
"Turn on \"Trash Hunter mode\" to receive notifications about illegal dumps around you"
"\"Trash Hunter mode\" has been turned on and will be active for following period."
"Do you really want to create event?"
"Do you really want to delete activity?"
"Do you really want to delete image?"
"Do you really want to delete trash?"
"Please confirm your attendance. Information about attendees is available for the organisers in order to help them with preparations"
"Do you really want to mark this dump as spam?"
"List of E-mails (Separated by a comma without space)"
"The link may be broken, or the page may have been removed."
"Time TO must be greater than time FROM"
"Oops, the phone you entered looks invalid :("
"Passwords must contain at least 1 uppercase letter, 1 lowercase letter and 1 number."
"Do you think this report is not relevant or contains anything unwanted?"
"Send this report by e-mail to local municipality or environmental NGO"
"There is no cleaning event for this dump"
"Distance is greater than 100m from trash. You must be close to the dump."
"To create or update trash you have to take at least %d photo"
"You must first choose the position of meeting"
"You did not select an organization. Select company or organization in edit profile."
"User does not exist. Please change the email address or register."
"Do you really want to mark this trash point as SPAM?"
"Do you really want to join in on the event?"
"Location Accuracy Trying to get better location"
"Do you really want to reset password?"
"Password reset successful. Please check your e-mail."
"Facebook token is credential or malformed or expired"
"An account already exists. Please sign in with e-mail."
"User\'s account has been disabled, deleted, or its credentials are no longer valid"
"Marking collection point that no longer exists failed"
"Marking collection point that no longer exists successful"
"Do you really want to mark collection point that it does not longer exists?"
"You must select at least one trash"
"I want to organize a cleaning action"
"I want to receive notifications about cleaning actions"
"There are no articles yet, please come back later."
"I don't want to organize or help with organization of any cleaning event"
"I don't want to receive any information about cleaning events"
"Use TrashOut to locate and monitor illegal dumps all around the world."
"When you see an illegal dump, tap plus or report button, take a picture and fill in all the details."
"Local municipalities, citizens or NGOs can be notified about illegal dumps in their neighborhood."
"Find the nearest collection point for your bulky trash, organize cleaning event, or learn more about environment."
"Create your account to track your activities and earn green points. Make sure to allow GPS and notifications to take full advantage of TrashOut."
"Go to your e-mail to activate your account"
"Thank you for keeping our database up to date! Our admins will review your report."
"This trash is already marked as SPAM."
"Thank you for keeping our database up to date and taking care of our environment."
"Please select Image or Logo of collection Point. It's not necessary, but it helps others to find the place easier. "
"Note is too long. Maximum is 180 characters."
"Do you really want to delete this Collection Point?"
"You successfully joined this organization at TrashOut platform."
"Do you really want to leave this Organization?"
"Do you want to join this Organization?"
"Select file with one e-mail on each line (.csv, .txt)"
"Write e-mails separated by comma or on new line"
"You have {currentPoints} points. Get {nextLevel} more to reach next level. Report and update dumps or attend cleaning events."
"I want to organize or help with organization of cleaning events"
"I want to take part in cleaning events"

"Areas that you selected to monitor in your profile settings. Set regular e-mail notifications about reported and cleaned dumps. Get notified daily, weekly or monthly to stay informed about activities in the location you care about."
"Organizations that you created or are part of in TrashOut app."
"All events, future and past, that you organized or joined."
"This Collection Point is already marked as SPAM."
"Map with meeting point and area to be cleaned"
"Users of TrashOut that are members of this organization"
"Please draw rectangle to map. If you draw rectangle smaller than 30 km you will be able to select specific Dumps on the map."
"You selected large area. Its larger than 30 km. Specific dumps will not be shown on the map."
"You selected small area. Dumps will be shown."

"From here you can send email invitations to other TrashOut users or outside people with suggestion to join this organization and TrashOut platform. They will receive template email invitation, that was created and can be edited by the managers of this organization."
"Do you want to remove this article?"
"I want to organize or help with organization of any cleaning event"
"I don't want to organize or help with organization of any cleaning event"
"I want to take part in cleaning events"
"I do not want to participate in cleaning events as volunteer"
"This is your API key, than can be used for widgets or API"
"This is Widget Code. You just put it to your webpage code."
"in TrashOut application. It takes place tomorrow"
"Thank you for making our World cleaner for everyone."
"You received this e-mail because you joined this event in TrashOut application and agreed to terms and conditions of TrashOut app."
"we noticed you created an event called"
"in TrashOut application. Thank you for taking care of environment."
"In case you would like to edit or cancel your event"

"Please know that one day before your event we will ask people who joined to confirm their attendance. One day after the event we will ask for their guess of how many people came, how many bags of trash were collected and if they want to share some pictures. Check event detail on admin.trashout.ngo to see this information. "
"Thank you for making our World cleaner for everyone. Don't forget to use TrashOut mobile application to find and update illegal dumps and learn about environment."
"You received this e-mail because you created an event in TrashOut application and agreed to terms and conditions of TrashOut app."
"we want to THANK YOU for participating in a cleaning event"
"that took place yesterday. You are awesome! Thanks to your effort this location is now cleaner."
"Let others know how successful you were. Fill in number of bags collected, number of attendees and share your photos. Inspire others to make the World cleaner."
"Thank you for making our World cleaner for everyone. Don't forget to use TrashOut mobile application to find and update illegal dumps and learn about environment."
"You received this e-mail because you joined an event in TrashOut application and agreed to terms and conditions of TrashOut app."
"in TrashOut application by its manager. Your invitation:"

"TrashOut application allows people to map and monitor illegal dumps and trash all around the world. This data is then used by various organisations and municipalities to make our World cleaner. Download TrashOut mobile application for Android"

"You received this e-mail because some user of TrashOut application has invited you. In order to do so this user has to be member or manager of organization you were invited to join. Users decide who to invite and what to write in invitation. Until you join TrashOut as user"
"thank you for taking care of our environment. You are awesome! Please see below recent activities in area you selected in TrashOut application."
"If you want to change frequency of this email notification"
"Thank you for making our World cleaner for everyone. Don't forget to use TrashOut mobile application to find and update illegal dumps and learn about environment."
"You received this e-mail because you subscribed to monitor this area in TrashOut application and agreed to terms and conditions of TrashOut app. You can change your preferences any time"
"Collection point was successfully marked as spam."
"Event start date has to be before end date"
"You can modify which items to export in filter"
"At least one is required to be filled."

"In this section you can see and add managers for areas and subareas you administrate. Managers comparing to ordinary users are able to add articles, which will be shown both in mobile and web application worldwide. Moreover, you can see users that receive email notifications about activities in your areas."
"In this section you can see administrators, managers and users. You can add or remove administrators for areas and subareas. You can also manage aliases."

"Feel free to choose areas that you care about. Set email notifications and their frequency, so you can stay informed about reported and cleaned dumps in these areas. You can monitor as many areas as you wish and change settings of notifications any time!"
"Do you want to delete administrator from area?"
"Do you want to delete manager from area?"

"You can create Alias here. Be carefull. Process is irreversible. For example you can create alias \"Czechia\" for root Czech republic. After that you will see in area lists only root Czech republic. "
"Size of some Image exceeded the limit. Upload smaller image (max 2 MB)."
"You don't have permission to delete this SPAM"
"Set regular email notifications to monitor areas you care about"
"You don't have permission to approve user."

"In this section you choose area you wish to see. You can filter from continents up to smaller areas such as city districts. Either select some option from drop down menu or leave it on \"select\" and click submit."
"TrashOut is an environmental project which aims to map all illegal dumps around the world and to help citizens recycle more."
"Do you really wish to open another app containing maps to navigate you?"
"Do you really want to call the collection point?"
"Do you really want to open email composer?"
"You cannot use wide images. Please use another image. Image ratio has to be smaller than 1:2."
"Maximum number of uploaded images reached (you can upload maximum 20 files)."
"Some error in API occurred.. Please refresh the page."
"You must be logged in to create an event"
"It seems you are offline. Do not worry! This report will upload automatically later once your phone is online again."
"Do not forget to update dumps around you or join cleaning event."
"You don't have permissions to view this page."
"Thanks for information, we will check it out."

"TrashOut is an environmental project which aims to map and monitor all illegal dumps around the world.
Our goal is to involve citizens, governments, municipalities and organizations so we can together contribute to cleaner world for everyone."
"Thank you, event was successfully created. You can edit your event and see attendees at www.admin.trashout.ngo."
"We need to import photos of dump"

"This is a template for email invitations to join you organisation. Those can be send out by members of your organisations to other users or outside pople. You can tell here why they should join TrashOut and specifically your organisation, what do you do as organisation, what is your vision, etc."
"Illegal dump report! Details about illegal dump can be found on website:"
"Event start time has to be before end time"
"There is no user record corresponding to this identifier. The user may have been deleted."
"An account already exists. Please sign in with your Facebook account."
"Are you sure to delete your profile?"
"TrashOut - information about dumps in area you monitor"
"Failed to read data from facebook profile"
"There was no new activity in this category in selected period of time. You can see list of all dumps"
"Your report of an illegal dump was updated"
"Check out its new status in TrashOut app and stay always informed"
"TrashOut - important information about the event you created"
"I agree with processing of my personal data. I have read and accepted"
"We are experiencing temporary issue with our server. We are doing our best to fix it soon. Please come back later."
"Please connect to the internet in order to see this section."

"This website uses cookies to give you the best experience. Agree by clicking the 'Accept' button. We use cookies to be able to provide social media features, analyze our traffic and behavior of the visitors on our website and for marketing purposes. Sometimes we share this anonymized information with the 3rd parties' tools. Read our "
"Your device is not connected to the internet. Take a picture and report it later via www.admin.trashout.ngo."
"Please use images with aspect ratio 1:2 or smaller (not a widescreen image) and with size up to 2 MB."
"The collection point can only be added from the web application to which you can log in via a web browser"
"At the moment, the collection point can only be edited from the web application that is accessible through a web browser"
"Events can only be edited from the TrashOut web application that is accessible through a web browser"
"Do not forget to update all dumps you cleaned during the event"
"Thank you for creating this trash. You are awesome!"
